body: Hahahaha nice, I'm glad that mother's love is fair.

I thought the mom discovering her fat son secretly recording her nightly secret sex sessions with her favorite son, happened a little sooner than it should have. Like who doesn’t lock their door while doing or watching something shady?🤣 
I understand why the author wrote it like that, to finally have the fat son one up’d his better younger brother; To finally be better in something than his brother. But I feel like the author could have fucked with the him mentally a little longer before including him in the twisted incest shit the mother and brother participate in. Oh well.. 🤷‍♂️

Hm...
No end but no continue either?
Well that mother have some serious issue.
I mean she want the lil bro to gain some skills so she could obtain him later.
Well nah, if there is next chapter i bet that she would've already pregnant with that fatso..

I like this one, but I'm starting to hate the mother. What an entitled cunt. "It's a man's duty, to please the woman."
No wonder why she's single. I hope her sons fucks the living shit out of her and submit to them completely.
That is if there's a sequel to this one. I hope.
It may just have been a long time but this is the first time I've seen this trope used in a clean manner that it disoriented my boner.
